title: Can the churches teach political discipleship without dividing into partisan camps?
description:
CRC Synod 2018 Overture 12 initiator Nick Loenen discusses his overture with lawyers Doug Vander Griend and Chuck Adams hosted by Paul Vander Klay

Agenda for Synod 2018 https://www.crcna.org/sites/default/files/2018_agenda.pdf
